item.description:
This UNIQUE “antivirus software of the mind” will help you to ….
• Enhance your Reiki for self-healing!
• Give more effective Reiki treatments to others!
• More easily manifest the Reiki precepts!
• Achieve your Reiki goals even faster and more powerfully!
• Master the Law of Attraction!
Tuition includes course-book, practice CD and access to online community of practitioners.

Your Instructor for this course is Deborah Yaffee. Deborah completed her Reiki training through Mastership with John Harvey Gray and Lourdes Gray, and her teacher training with Libby Barnett. Deborah is also a Certified Hypnotherapist and Instructor with the National Guild of Hypnotists. She holds the special certification and training required to teach the method you will learn in this course.
5 Thursdays 6:00 – 9:00 pm
May 10, 17, 24, 31 and June 7
at HeartSound BodyWork
32 Industrial Drive East, Northampton
Fee: $125
Choose to pre-pay the 5-session course or
TAKE THE FIRST CLASS FREE OF CHARGE
to try it out as long as you are pre-registered by May 4th.

Register for the series or the free intro class at www.liberationastrology.com/events.htm or call 413-625-2800
item.name: Power-Up Your Reiki Healing with Spiritual Self Hypnosis
